content: perseus is a cozy knit hat available in sizes from toddler through adult designed to showcase the vibrant hues of the berroco vintage handpaint yarn its simple yet stylish design ensures a perfect fit for the whole family offering warmth and a touch of color for every season *cable pattern is both charted and written out * **sizes** toddler child small medium large **finished measurements** 14 16 18 20 22 / 35 5 40 5 45 5 51 56 cm around unstretched x 8½ 9 9½ 10 10½ / 21 5 23 24 25 5 26 5 cm high shown in size child and medium **yarn** berroco vintage handpaint 100 g 1 hank for all sizes shown in #5230 blushing rose child and #5227 forest canopy medium **needles** 16 / 40 cm circular needles sizes 5 / 3 75 mm and 7 / 4 5 mm *or size to obtain gauge* 1 set double-pointed needles or preferred needles for working small circumferences size 7 / 4 5 mm **notions** stitch markers 1 a different color for bor and tapestry needle **gauge** 20 sts and 26 rounds = 4 / 10 cm in st st on larger needles 12 stitch pattern repeat measures 2 / 5 cm unstretched *gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge *
